actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: To provide for the payment of death benefits in lieu of servicemen's group life insurance benefits to the eligible survivors of certain individuals killed while participating in the Air Force Reserve Officers' Training Corps flight instruction program.

summary.text: Provides for the payment of death benefits in lieu of servicemen's group life insurance benefits to the eligible survivors of certain individuals killed while participating in the Air Force Reserve Officers' Training Corps flight instruction program.

titles.title: To provide for the payment of death benefits in lieu of servicemen's group life insurance benefits to the eligible survivors of certain individuals killed while participating in the Air Force Reserve Officers' Training Corps flight instruction program.
